text: mema govipaḷa satungē kusa tuḷa æti dǣ piriminṭa pamaṇak satuya. apagē sahakāriyanhaṭa tahanam karana laddaki. eya miya giya tattvayē tibē nam ehi ovuhu havulkaruvan veti yæyi ovuhu pavasati. ovungē mema prakāśayaṭa ohu (allāh) ovunaṭa prativipāka denu æta. niyata vaśayenma ohu pragnāvantaya. sarva gnānīya
